verses.content: Chun, Leah naunu Dina, Jakob a neipêk chu, chu ram nunghâkhai hmu dingin a va lêng suok a.
Chun, Hiv mi Hamor, chu ram lal naupa Sekem chun ama chu a lo hmuh a; a man a, a zâlpui a, ân tlâwm tah a.
Chun, a lungril chu Jakob naunu Dina chunga chun a um tlat a, chu nunghâk chu a hmangai a, bau ṭhatakin a biek a.
Sekem chun a pa Hamor chu a biek a, “Chu nunghâk chu nuhmeiin mi neipêk rawh,” a tih a.
Jakob chun a naunu Dina chu Sekem chun a sukkhawhlo ti a lo hriet a, nisienlakhawm, a naupa- salhai chu phûlah ran lai an um leiin an hung hmakhat chu a to zing a.
Sekem pa Hamor chu Jakob be dingin a kuomah a feh a.

Jakob naupasalhai chun an hriet phingleh phûla inthawk chun an hung a; chun, Jakob naunu zâlpuiin Israelhai laiah thil suol invêtthlâk- tak, thil thaw dêr lo ding chu a thaw ta leiin an lungngai a, an lunginsen ta êm êm a.
Hamor ruok chun anni a biek a, “Ka naupa Sekem lungril chu in naunu chungah a um tlat a: lungin- siettakin nuhmeiin inneitir ta unla.
Innei pawl ei tiu, in naunuhmei hai mîn neitir unla, kan nau- nuhmeihai khawm nei bawk ro.
Kan ramah keini lai um in ta, in nuomna hmun hmunah um bawk unla, hienglai hin um unla, sum- dâwng unla, insukmuk ro,” a tih a.
Sekem khawm chun a nunghâk pa le ṭahai kuomah, “Mi lunginsiet ro, ka kuoma in hril taphawt pêng ka ti cheu.
Man le thilpêk chu iengzat khawm ngên unla, in ti ang peiin pêng ka ti cheu: iengkhawm ni sienla, nunghâk chu nuhmeiin mîn neitir phawt el ro,” a tih a.
Jakob nauhai chun an farnu Dina a sukkhawhlopêk lei chun Sekem le a pa Hamor chu zaihlêmin an dawn a,
an kuomah, “Hi thil, sertanlo mi kuoma kan farnu pêk hi thaw thei naw ning ungah; chu chu kan ta dingin hmingsietna ding a ni sih a:
hieng anga in tiem ruok chun in thu ang chu remti thei kan tih: nangni laia pasal taphawt chu keini angin sertanin um unla.
Chuongchun, kan naunuhmei- hai inneitir kan ti cheu a, keini khawma in naunuhmeihai nei bawk kan ta; chun, in kuomah um kan ta, chi khat ei hung ni ding annâwm.
Nisienlakhawm, sertan kawnga kan thu in zâwm naw ding chun, kan naunu chu ṭhuoi kan ta, fe el kan tih,” an tih a.
An thu chun Hamor le Hamor naupa Sekem chu an suklâwm tah a.
Chuongchun, tlangvâl chun Jakob naunu chu a dit hle sih a, chu thil chu sâwt nghâk loin a thaw nghâl tah a; ama chu a pa sûnghai laia inzâkai tak a nih.
Chun, Hamor le a naupa Sekem chun an khaw kul kawtkhâr chu an tlung a, an khuohai chu an biek a,

Sawtaka mihai saw mi rem- takin an um a, chuleiin, hi rama hin umin, hieng lai hin sumdâwng raw hai se, ngai ta u, an ta dingin ram khawm hi a lien huntâwk bawk a; an naunuhmeihai saw nuhmeiahai nei inla, ei naunuhmeihai khawm anni inneitir bawk ei tiu.
“Nisienlakhawm, chi khat ei hung nina dinga ei kuoma um chu hieng anga ei tiem chau hin sawhai sawn an mi remtipui ding a nih a, sertan an ni angin eini laia pasal taphawt chu sertan hung ni ve inla.
An ran dâm, an sum dâm, an sa po po dâm eini ta a ni vawng naw ding am a nih? An thu hi remtipui el ei tiu, chuongchun, ei kuomah an um el ding a nih.” an tih a.
Chun, Hamor le a naupa Sekem thu chu a khaw kul kawtkhâra suok taphawt chun an zâwm a, a khaw kul kawtkhâra suok po po, pasal taphawt chun ser an intantir ta vawng a.
Chun, ni thum niha an nat laitak chun, Jakob naupasalhai laia mi pahni, Dina ṭahai Simon le Levi chun an kâwlhnâm chawi ve vein inrûkin khuo chu an thawh a, pasal po po chu an that zo vawng el tah a.
Chuongchun, Hamor le a naupa Sekem chu kâwlhnâm ngeiin an that a, Sekem ina inthawkin Dina chu an ṭhuoi a, an suok tah a.
Jakob naupasalhai chun an mi thathai chu an va nangchîng a, an farnu an sukkhawhlo pêk leiin khuo chu an rawk tah a.
An berâm ruolhai, an bâwng- ruolhai, an sabengtunghai, khuoa thil umhai le loa thil umhai an lâk- pêk a;
an sum po po an lâk a, an nauhai le an nuhmeihai po po an man a, in sûnga um taphawt chu an fe hmangpui tah a.

Chun, Jakobin Simeon le Levi kuoma chun, “Nangnîn hi rama um Kanaan mihai le Periz mihai laia hin, theida in mîn phurtirin in mi suklungzîng hle a nih; kei tlâwmte ka ni leiin mi thaw dingin hung inpun khâwm an ta, mi that el an tih; chuongchun, sukbohmangin um ka tih, kei le ka sûnghai le hin,” a tih a.
Anni ruok chun, “Kan farnu hi nawchizawr thawin a thaw el ding a ni?” an tih a.
